name: Little Sprouts Daycare - Multiplication Version
description:
e

Little Sprouts Daycare is a simple time management game where you, Nanny Shmoop, have to take care of all the baby vegetables that get dropped off at your daycare.

This game allows for a quick, fun, and entertaining way to review your multiplication facts!

********************************************************************************************************************************************************

Gameplay

Moving Nanny Shmoop: point/click

Each sprout will tell you what it needs. You simply need to move the veggie to the correct spot and choose the correct setting to meet the sprouts need. 

Each sprout type has different demands. Some need more water; others may need more visits to the sunning station. Stay on your toes to keep the sprouts happy until they are picked up!

********************************************************************************************************************************************************

This is one of my many educational games that I created to help kids have fun learning their facts. Check out more at Https://www.fun4thebrain.com. I hope you enjoy it!
